Item.Title: Sony Cyber-shot DSC-WX300/B 18.2 Megapixels Digital Camera - 20x Optical/2x
Item.Description:
We have been selling on eBay since February 2010 and have over 30,000 5-Star reviews.

We'll leave you positive feedback after your payment clears.
If you feel you can't leave us top ratings, call us and we'll make it right!

Click to Contact Us

 

Factory Refurbished Sony Cyber-shot DSC-WX300/B 18.2 Megapixels Digital Camera - 20x Optical/2x Digital Zoom - 3.0-inch LCD Display - 4.3-86 mm Lens - Black

 

Product Condition: Factory Refurbished to manufacturer condition, may show limited signs of use, with warranty.
Packaging: Can be repackaged for protection during shipping.
Accessories: * All essential accessories included, unless otherwise noted.
* May be missing manuals and/or software
Shipping: Most items ship via FedEx or USPS 1 business day after payment clears

 

 This Sony digital camera is easy to use with the features you need to take great pictures. A high quality lens with optimized exposure, focus and color as you would expect from a Sony product. This camera delivers what you need to capture those memorable events.

Be sure to read the specifications for all the great features.
Please note, the pictures used are intended to be a representation of the model of product for sale, it is not the actual item. Please be sure to check the condition of the unit that is for sale.

Product Specs
Payment
Shipping
Returns
Feedback

Features & Specs

Model number DSC-WX300/B
Product Name Sony Cyber-shot DSC-WX300/B Digital Camera
Product Type Digital Camera
Color Black
Sensor Resolution 18.2 Megapixels
Optical Sensor Type Exmor R CMOS
Optical Sensor Size 1/2.3 inches
Zoom Optical: 20x; Digital: 2x
Image Processor BIONZ
Auto Focus TTL contrast detection
AE/AF Control Face-priority AF, Subject-tracking AF
Face Detection Automatic Face Tracking technology, Blink Detection technology, face-priority AF function, Smile Shutter
Digital Video Format AVCHD, H.264
Maximum Video Resolution 1920 x 1080
Image Recording Format JPEG
Light Sensitivity ISO 80-1600, ISO auto (80-3200), ISO auto (80-12800)
Exposure Metering Multi-segment, center-weighted, spot
Exposure Modes Program, automatic
Shooting Programs Landscape, night portrait, pet, fireworks, soft snap, night scene, beach, snow, high sensitivity, soft skin, handheld twilight, gourmet, anti-motion blur, backlight correction HDR
Special Effects Illustration, Water Color, Miniature, partial color, Toy camera, Pop Color, HDR Painting, Rich-tone monochrome, Soft High-key
White Balance Custom, automatic, presets
White Balance Presets Incandescent, cloudy, flash, daylight, fluorescent light (daylight white), fluorescent light (natural white), fluorescent light (white)
Maximum Shutter Speed 1/1600 seconds
Minimum Shutter Speed 4 seconds
Lens Type 20x zoom lens - 4.3 - 86 mm - f/3.5-6.5 G
Focal Length Equivalent to 35 mm Camera 25-500 mm
Focus Adjustment Automatic
Minimum Focus Distance 2.0 inches
Macro Focus Range 2.0 inches
Lens Construction 10 groups/11 elements
Flash Modes Fill-in mode, slow synchro, auto mode, flash OFF mode, red-eye reduction
Continuous Shooting Speed 10 frames per second
Self Timer Delay 10 seconds, 2 seconds
Display Type 3.0-inch LCD
Display Resolution 460800 pixels
Microphone Operation Mode Stereo
Connector Type 1 x Hi-Speed USB; 1 x HDMI output
Memory Card Slot Memory Stick PRO Duo card, SD card
Item Includes AC power adapter, USB cable, wrist strap
Battery Type 1 x Sony NP-BX1 Lithium-ion rechargeable
Supported Memory Cards Memory Stick Duo, SD Memory Card, Memory Stick PRO Duo, SDXC Memory Card, Memory Stick PRO Duo Mark2, SDHC Memory Card, Memory Stick PRO-HG Duo
Image Storage JPEG 4896 x 3672; JPEG 4896 x 2752; JPEG 3648 x 2736; JPEG 2592 x 1944; JPEG 1920 x 1080; JPEG 640 x 480
Video Capture AVCHD - 1920 x 1080 - 60 fps - 24 Mbps; AVCHD - 1920 x 1080 - 60 fps - 17 Mbps; AVCHD - 1440 x 1080 - 60 fps - 9 Mbps; H.264 - 1440 x 1080 - 30 fps - 12 Mbps; H.264 - 1280 x 720 - 30 fps - 6 Mbps; H.264 - 640 x 480 - 30 fps - 3 Mbps
Dimensions 3.8 x 2.2 x 1.0 inches
Weight 4.9 oz
Warranty
Warranty: Manufacturer warranty. For defective returns, SaveCentral will give you a full refund and will arrange for and pay all shipping costs.

 

Shipping

  • Within the United States, we ship via FedEx or USPS at our discretion.
  • If we offer free ground shipping on a listing, it will be for the 48 contiguous United States only. Shipping to Alaska, Hawaii and the US Territories will incur regular shipping charge as we cannot ship via the regular ground service.
  • Freight delivery appointments may be required for oversized or heavy items.
  • SaveCentral is not responsible for any customs, duties, and/or taxes for international shipments. We do not mark merchandise values below value or mark items as "gifts" as US and International government regulations prohibit such behavior.
  • Removing the product from the United States will void all warranties/guarantees. Please check with the product manufacturer to find out their international warranty terms.
  • We only ship to Confirmed Addresses on your Paypal Account. Please do not request a change to your shipping address after you submit payment as we cannot change the address once your order is placed.
  • Orders will leave our warehouse within 48 hours of your payment being cleared by Paypal. We ship Monday through Friday, we do not ship on Saturdays or Sundays because our offices are closed. At this time, we do not provide local pick up.
  • Please Note: All International orders (including orders shipping to US territories) will be held for a period of 72 hours from the time of payment to insure payment via PayPal is cleared.

Payment
  • We only accept payment by PayPal and they must be from confirmed addresses.
  • Immediate payment is required, or within 5 days of auction closing.
  • We charge sales tax in Colorado. State taxes will be calculated at checkout.

Returns
 
Buy With Confidence! We inspect and test all of our products to ensure it meets the manufacturer quality standards. We have a 30 Day Return Policy and every product has the Manufacturer Warranty against defects. If there does happen to be an issue, we will work with you to make it right!
  • Please contact our Customer Service team if you have any issues with your item and to obtain an RMA number.
  • You can return or exchange an item purchased within 30 days of the original purchase date. SaveCentral will give you a full refund and will arrange for and pay all shipping costs associated with authorized, defective returns. If SaveCentral can not reproduce the reason for a defective return, the customer will be responsible for all shipping costs and will be charged a 15% restock fee.
  • In the event that a product received by the customer is defective and the product has been removed from the country after delivery within the USA (regardless if the item was shipped to a freight forwarder, international mail forwarder or a family member), the warranty/guarantee is no longer valid. The customer must return the product to the USA ship-to address listed on the order, and only then will SaveCentral provide a shipping return label for the return to SaveCentral. SaveCentral will not be responsible for any taxes, duties, or fees related to this return.
  • All items are part of our 30-Day Return Policy unless otherwise noted in the listing. But you must contact us for an RMA number. For non-defective returns, the customer is responsible for their original and return shipping costs. SaveCentral will provide a pre-paid return label for your convenience but the cost of return shipping will be deducted from your authorized refund. Your non-defective return will be charged a 15% restock fee.
  • Returned product must be complete, in original boxes and packaging materials and contain all software, accessories and blank warranty cards provided at time of original purchase. Customer will be charged the replacement cost of missing, damaged or altered products and accessories.
  • All returns must be postmarked within 10 days of the shipping label being issued to be considered within the return policy, or SaveCentral will asses a 15% restock fee.
  • Refunds will be processed to your account 7-10 days after SaveCentral receives your authorized return at our facility.
  • Prior to the return of any product to SaveCentral, you must obtain an RMA number. Product returned without an RMA number will be charged a 15% restocking fee or returned to the customer at the customer's expense.

Customer Support & Feedback
  • Our customer support is available from 9:00am to 5:00pm MT, Monday through Friday.
  • Please call us, email us or contact us via the eBay Contact Seller Functionality.
  • Please contact us with any concerns so that we can ensure you are satisfied with your purchase.
  • If you feel you can't leave us top ratings, contact us and we'll make it right!

 

SaveCentral operates this outlet store. We have been selling on eBay and Amazon since early 2010 and we guarantee your satisfaction. Check out our generous returns policy, and feel free to contact us with any questions.
See some of our other listings in our store: http://stores.ebay.com/SaveCentral-Outlet

ShippingDetails.PaymentInstructions: Please note: This is a Factory Refurbished product. Please make sure that PayPal has your correct shipping address on file as we can not change your address once your order is placed. (sku: DSC-WX300/B )

ReturnPolicy.Description: SaveCentral offers a generous 30 day return policy for all products that do not meet or exceed the condition described in the listing. We will give you a replacement or full refund and will arrange for and pay all shipping costs associated with authorized, defective returns. Please note that you are responsible for all shipping charges on non-defective returns and will be charged a 15% restock fee. An RMA (Return Materials Authorization) number must be requested within 30 Days of the Invoice Date. Most products also carry a manufacturer warranty against defects. Please contact us with questions.

Item.ConditionDescription: Restored to manufacturer condition. May show limited signs of use. Manuals and software might not be included, but can usually be downloaded from the manufacturer. These items can be in the original manufacturer box or repackaged for protection during shipping.

Item.Title: V7 V7-7PSATA-19IN SATA Cable - 7-pin Female to 7-pin Female - 3 GBps - 1.5 Feet
Item.Description:
We have been selling on eBay since February 2010 and have over 30,000 5-Star reviews.

We'll leave you positive feedback after your payment clears.
If you feel you can't leave us top ratings, call us and we'll make it right!

Click to Contact Us

 

Factory Sealed V7 V7-7PSATA-19IN SATA Cable - 7-pin Female to 7-pin Female - 3 GBps - 1.5 Feet Red

 

Please Note: This specially priced item is limited to 2 per customer and you can only purchase 2 of these specially priced items ending in ".99" (such as $0.99, $3.99, etc.) in a 10 day period.

Product Condition: Brand new in original manufacturer packaging with manufacturer warranty.
Packaging: Original manufacturer packaging.
Accessories: Includes all accessories as provided by the manufacturer.
Shipping: Most items ship via FedEx or USPS 1 business day after payment clears

 

 The V7 19-inch SATA Cable is designed for data transfer between two devices. The data transfers smoothly with the copper conductor and transfers at a rate of 3 GBps.
Please note, the pictures used are intended to be a representation of the model of product for sale, it is not the actual item. Please be sure to check the condition of the unit that is for sale.

Features & Specs

Model number V7-7PSATA-19IN
Product Name V7 V7-7PSATA-19IN Data Transfer Cable
Product Type Data Transfer Cable
Cable Length 1.5 feet
Connector on First End 7-pin SATA
Connector on Second End 7-pin SATA
Conductor Copper
Data Transfer Speed 3 Gbps
